summary: This bill, the Expanding Access to Diabetes Self-Management Training Act of 2025, aims to improve access to diabetes outpatient self-management training services under Medicare. It modifies existing regulations regarding these services, including specifying the training hours and removing certain limitations. It also mandates the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation (CMI) to test the provision of virtual diabetes outpatient self-management training services, evaluating its impact on health outcomes and expenditures.
